channel.title: Please help, how to install privater sever on vps
channel.description: Hi can someone please suggest a tutorial on how to upload and run server from my VPS. Thank You.

item.title: Please help, how to install privater sever on vps
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

Hi. What kind of VPS is it? Windows or Linux?

Windows
Upload your RSPS files to uppit.com.
Go on your VPS and download the files.
Download JDK.
Go inside your run.bat or whatever and change your JDK path etc.

Linux Ubuntu
Upload your server files to uppit.com
Download them etcâ€¦
Go to your install thing and find and install JDK.
You will have to change your .bat to .sh

If you need more in depth please PM me.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help, how to install privater sever on vps
